name: modifyObjectStorageBucketAccess
description:
Allows changing basic Cross-origin Resource Sharing (CORS) and Access Control Level (ACL) settings.
Only allows enabling/disabling CORS for all origins, and/or setting canned ACLs.


For more fine-grained control of both systems, please use the more [fully-featured S3 API](https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/s3/bucketops/#put-bucket-acl) directly.

clusterId.description: The ID of the cluster this bucket exists in.

acl.description: The Access Control Level of the bucket, as a canned ACL string. For more fine-grained control of ACLs, use the S3 API directly.

cors_enabled.description: If true, the bucket will be created with CORS enabled for all origins. For more fine-grained controls of CORS, use the S3 API directly.

body.description: The changes to make to the bucket's access controls.
